summary: When a scientist develops a formula to regenerate dying liver cells, it accidentally turns him into an albino vampire with a taste for prostitutes.
cast: Bernie Casey|Rosalind Cash|Marie O'Henry|Ji-Tu Cumbuka|Milt Kogan|Stu Gilliam|Elizabeth Robinson|Della Thomas|Marc Alaimo|Gwyn Karon|Sam Laws|Virginia Lynne|Judith Angeline|Janet Day|Pamela Serpe|Eric Washington|Dan Spelling|Cora Lee Day|Bob Minor|LaVerne Jackson|Angel Colbert|Rai Tasco|Nancy Middleton|Manfred Bernhard|Adrienne Richard|Wilson Bryant III|Kajo Thomas|Buff Brady|Roma Alvarez|Gregory Awosika|Sam Nudell|Philip Roye|Gene Massey|Val Loring|Joy Lee|Shirley Harding|Joseph M. Reynolds|Bobby Angelle|Fred Johnson
title: Doctor Black, monstruo asesino
